root.name: PContainer
root.description: The PContainer object manages input focus between a collection of vertically stacked components. It can also handle scrolling its children components within its bounds. Note, however, that unlike traditional UI toolkits, the PContainer object does not manage layout of its children. Each child component should have its bounds set before the container is initialized. It is also assumed that each component will be added in top-to-bottom order.

field.fdescription: Constant value indicating an "unbounded" height, used in calculating bounds for items in a scrolling container.
True if this container should scroll its children within its bounds.
The current scrolling y-offset within its bounds.
